activities: Harris Beach PLLC is a law firm which practices in many areas of law.  In general, we anticipate potentially receiving personal information from clients with corporations, employees, or customers in the EU.  We anticipate the majority of this information to come to us in connection with either litigation or transactional matters. For matters involving litigation, our firm may be called upon to perform certain electronic discovery services, including the processing and hosting of electronic data so that documents can be reviewed and analyzed by attorneys, para-professionals, or consultants.  For transactional engagements, we expect that there may be certain personal information disclosed to us in association with either due diligence investigations or the acquisition or divestiture of property, assets, or rights located in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Privacy Program
